subject: Re: [junit] Submitting a link to the JUnit page
msgSnippet: ... Thanks for the kind words and the plug in the book.  I look forward to reading it myself. Mike -- Mike Clark Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
messageBody:
Nicholas Lesiecki wrote:

> Thanks Mike. BTW, good job on JUnitPerf, we've used it a couple of times. It
> makes good use of the JUnit framework as well as being very practical. We
> covered it in the book. I think Rick wrote the section.
>

Thanks for the kind words and the plug in the book. I look forward to reading
it myself.

Mike

Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
